title: Drawer Repair Kit Hardware Furniture Accessories Brackets Replacement Kitchen Drawer Kit Drawer Replacement Parts for Reinforce Repair Wooden Chipboard Dresser Drawers, Includes Screws (3)
features: Scope of applications: the drawer fix kit will be a helpful way to repair, support or reinforce the bottoms of those drawers that have sagged with age, suitable for most drawers, such as the wooden drawers, MDF drawers and chipboard drawers

Suitable measurement: each drawer bracket replacement measures approximately 13.4 x 1.2 inches, more size details are shown in the pictures, which are suitable for installation on the 14 to 24 inch drawers

Offer a long service life: made of steel material, the dresser drawer support firm, rust proof and sturdy, will not be easy to break, which will serve you for a long period, producing more convenience
Invisible design: the cabinet drawer bracket is designed to fix on the bottom without affecting the beauty of the drawer, so you will not see the bracket, giving your drawer a strong support
Package Content: the package includes 3 sets of drawer replacement parts, each set contains 2 x brackets, 4 x wood screws, 1 x hex nut, 1 x wing nut, 2 x short screws and 2 x long screws
description: Features:  Show your hands on ability: You need to determine the mending location of the drawer for installation and adjust the length of drawer bracket replacement, fix the bracket with wood screws, then tighten the wing nut or hex nut.  Convenient to store: Made in an appropriate size, the bracket hold drawer is easy and convenient to store for future reinforcement, so you can repair or reinforce the drawers anywhere or anytime.  Specifications: Material: steel Color: white Size: 13.4 x 1.2 inches  Package includes: 3 Sets of drawer repair kits  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays. Please confirm the size before ordering.
